title: someone is logged onto my mail account
body: i havent been able to log onto my main account for 2 months, says invalid username or password but i have it as a friend on my alt account and someone just logged into it and deleted all my friends off the list. i was online with 2 of them and they noticed the same thing. kinda pissed off right now.

replies.body: If possible, see if you can use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to use our available to retrieve the account.  If not, don't worry!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be happy to help!  Our account team will review the case, and respond as soon as possible!
i opened a ticket 3 or 4 days ago, the account recovery wont work because i didnt link it to my email like a bone head. the main problem is i may have my credit card attached to the account.
